item.title: Introduction to Azure Resource Graph (ARG)
item.description: Azure Resource Graph (ARG) is one of those things I stumbled upon while learning (or attempting) kusto query. At first, it was just curiousity, and then I realized the possibilities it opens up. In hindsight, it has always been there, but to truly appreciate ARG you need that aha moment that you’ll only get by trying it out! So let’s dive into some things I learned along the way… What is Azure Resource Graph (ARG)?
